show.title: PineTalk Podcast
show.subtitle: A Community Podcast
show.summary:
We discuss PINE64 hardware, software and open source in general.
Send in your questions!
A community ran podcast for the community.

Contact:
Email: pinetalk@pine64.org
Twitter: @TalkPine

title: 012: Privacy and Security with RTP
subtitle: In the twelfth episode of PineTalk, Ezra and Peter are first joined by RTP to talk privacy and security, to then discuss Community news, feedback and hardware-centric questions.
summary: In the twelfth episode of PineTalk, Ezra and Peter are joined by RTP to talk privacy and security. They also discuss community news: Pineroot, accelerated video playback on PinePhone and an example for a Lora communicator. The episode concludes with feedback regarding Signal Desktop on PinePhone and two hardware-centric questions.

chapters.title: What have we been up to lately?
